div.p: Dionysios, son of Heliodoros, to ..., (child) of Tesenouphis. I acknowledge that I have sold to you the white-coloured female donkey that belongs to me, with the ...-coloured foal following, just as they are, not to be rejected, and I have received the whole price in full ... Translation: N. Gonis, ZPE 229 (2024) 167
